QuestData.Title: Bitestone Enclave
QuestData.Description: This is an old drogbar enclave that we used to trade with. Now it is a base of operations for their raids.$b$bI need more time to gather what is left of our warbraves. Go, enter the enclave, and slay any you find in there.$b$bBuy us the time we need to gather our strength.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay drogbar in the Bitestone Enclave.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for clearing us a path. We should have a straight shot at Dargrul now.
